REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2690 reute r f BC-TIMES-MIRROR-<TMC>-SE 03-30 0056

TEXT.TITLE: TIMES MIRROR <TMC> SELLS TIMBERLANDS
TEXT.BODY: Times Mirror Co said it completed the sale of 26,000 acres of timberlands located in Washington and Oregon to <Fibre Co>. Terms were not disclosed. The company said the sale was part of its ongoing program to divest its timberland holdings in the Pacific Northwest. Reuter
